title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
SR:
In a workspace with many projects, perform the following steps to reproduce the issue:

1. Export Zip.
2. Select all projects.
3. Choose file types and select some options.
4. Press OK.
